paper.title: A simulation-based decision support methodology for reuse business
paper.abstract: Reuse business involving the collection of products and their reuse in the same or other markets constitutes one of the key issues concerning the shift toward a society that consumes materials more efficiently. This paper describes how to plan a new reuse business based on the current product selling business. Life cycle simulation (LCS) is applied to estimate financial and environmental revenues. Decision tree analysis embedded LCS is performed to quantify the uncertainty of various business scenarios. An example of rental PC business is demonstrated in this paper. The proposed methodology is useful for manufacturing companies that wish to launch a reuse business with less business risk.

domain_result.justification: 该论文主要关注的是再利用业务的决策支持方法，涉及生命周期模拟和决策树分析来评估业务风险和收益，但其核心应用领域是业务规划和环境效率，而非特定的金融研究领域如衍生品定价、金融风险管理或投资组合管理。
